person.persName: Thomas J. Scofield (Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer and postmaster. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth P. Womack Scofield. Father of John T. Scofield, William E. Scofield, Virginia Belle Scofield, and Jefferson Davis Scofield. Farmer in Graves County, Kentucky, in 1850. Postmaster of Baltimore in Hickman County from November 4, 1856, to November 24, 1857. Farmer in Hickman County in 1860.
